definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China/surname Miao

sentences.english: Over 22 million doses of squalene-containing flu vaccine have been administered.
sentences.chinese: 已接種的含角鯊烯流感疫苗數量超過2200萬劑。

sentences.english: We can, for the first time, think about a universal influenza vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們首次想到一種普適性的流感疫苗。

sentences.english: The pandemic influenza vaccines are not expected to provide protection against other influenza viruses.
sentences.chinese: 未期望大流行性流感疫苗針對其它流感病毒提供保護。

sentences.english: For example: The worried well are using up all the flu vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 那些“疑病症”患者都把流感疫苗給用完了。

sentences.english: The most significant action they can take is to offer subsidized flu shots, says Joyce Maroney, director of the Workforce Institute at Kronos, a provider of workforce management software.
sentences.chinese: 他們所能做的最有意義的事是提供補貼性流感疫苗。

sentences.english: Most countries with resource constraints do not have the means to access influenza vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 有資源制約的大多數國家缺乏獲得流感疫苗的手段。

sentences.english: Above, a lab at Vitrology, a Scottish company pursuing a swine flu vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲從事豬流感疫苗研究的蘇格蘭一家公司實驗室。

sentences.english: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人們應當像以往一樣繼續接種季節性流感疫苗。

sentences.english: Wash your hands often and get a yearly flu vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 勤洗手，每年來一針流感疫苗。

sentences.english: It's even easier to get a swine flu vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 接種豬流感疫苗都比買到“豬豬寵物”容易些。

sentences.english: Saudi Officials began a swine flu vaccination campaign ahead of the Hajji.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯官方在朝聖前進行了豬流感疫苗接種活動。

sentences.english: Also, influenza vaccines only become effective about 14 days after vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 另外，流感疫苗在接種之後約14天才能生效。

sentences.english: Flu vaccine only protects against flu-related pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 流感疫苗只預防流感引起的肺炎。

sentences.english: Getting the swine flu vaccine will protect them and their patients.
sentences.chinese: 注射豬流感疫苗會保護他們和他們的病人。

sentences.english: Seasonal flu vaccines use either an inactivated or weakened form of the flu virus.
sentences.chinese: 季節性流感疫苗使用滅活的或者減毒的流感病毒。

sentences.english: Five deaths in Sweden after swine flu jab tip of the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 五名瑞典人在豬流感疫苗刺戳後死亡。

definition: polio/abbr. for 脊髓灰質炎|脊髓灰质炎[ji3 sui3 hui1 zhi4 yan2]
epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
